name: discord-music-bot
description: An advanced discord music bot that supports Spotify, SoundCloud, YouTube, Twitch with Shuffling, Volume Control and Web Dashboard!

Website.description: URL of your webserver (Example: https://domain.xyz). Change this if you want to use the web-dashboard.

Spotify_ClientID.description: Spotify ClientID. This is used if you want to use Spotify features for your bot. (https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard/)

Spotify_ClientSecret.description: Spotify ClientSecret. This is used if you want to use Spotify features for your bot. (https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard/)
